title: JUST A QUERY ON TOMORROWS CN EXAM
content: We (4th Semester) have our CN Exam tomorrow . I wanted to know if the Finite State Machines for The Reliable Data Transfer Versions will be asked for the ESA . Wanted to really know this , since it is really tedious to memorise all the functions and sequences in the FSMs . Or as per for my Benefit Of Doubt , Is it only enough for me to know the concept and the timing diagrams for it.

comments.body: Check pyqs, if it's asked there, do learn it, or else you can skip the topic
